mapper.sql: p.product_id, p.product_code, p.product_name, p.pt_id, p.product_logo, ifnull(p.price, 0) price, p.activity_id, p.activity_name, p.prompt, p.eat_recommend, p.introduce, p.status, p.details, p.order_num, p.warehouse, p.deliver_type, p.share_explain, p.is_online, p.homeweekly_first_img, p.homeweekly_after_img, p.homefame_img, p.product_type, p.is_freight, p.is_quality, p.is_testing, p.fake_sales_copy, p.if_coupon, DATE_FORMAT(p.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time
mapper.select: SELECT spec_id,spec_name,spec_img,spec_price,stock_copy, limit_max_copy,package_desc,discount_price, DATE_FORMAT(limit_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as limit_start_time, DATE_FORMAT(limit_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as limit_end_time FROM t_spec WHERE product_id=#{product_id} and status=1 order by spec_price asc

SELECT picture_id,object_id,picture_type,small_img,original_img,DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time FROM t_pictures WHERE object_id = #{product_id} AND picture_type = 1 AND status=1 order by sort asc

select , (select tpl.label_title from t_product_label tpl where tpl.product_id = p.product_id and tpl.status = 0 and tpl.show_start <= NOW() and tpl.show_end >= NOW() limit 1) label_name from t_product p where p.product_id=#{productId}
select from t_product p where not exists (select product_id from t_extension e where e.product_id=p.product_id) and p.`status`=1

mapper.select: select from t_product p where p.product_id not in( select l.product_id from t_product_label l where l.show_end> NOW() and l.`status` = 0 ) and p.`status`=1

select , (select tpl.label_title from t_product_label tpl where tpl.product_id = p.product_id and tpl.status = 0 and tpl.show_start <= NOW() and tpl.show_end >= NOW() limit 1) label_name, (select ifnull(sum(op.quantity), 0) from t_order_product op where op.product_id = p.product_id and op.`STATUS` in (2,3,4,5)) sales_volume from t_product p, t_article_relation_pro arp, t_special_article tsa where p.product_id=arp.product_id and p.status=1 and arp.article_id = tsa.article_id and tsa.status=1 and arp.article_id=#{articleId}

SELECT tp.product_id,tp.product_name,tp.product_logo, (select tsp.spec_price from t_spec tsp where tsp.product_id = tp.product_id order by tsp.spec_price asc limit 1) as price, (select tsp.discount_price from t_spec tsp where tsp.product_id = tp.product_id order by tsp.spec_price asc limit 1) as discountPrice
FROM t_product tp ,t_sys_invite si where si.dict_type=6 and si.obj_id=tp.product_id order by si.sorts desc
